scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:integration: npm run build ## && node_modules/karma/bin/karma start karma.conf.integration.js
scripts.pretest:unit: echo > test/z-ensure-coverage.js; find src -type f -name '*.js' -print0 | xargs -0 -I '{}' echo 'require("../{}");' | egrep -v "(jetpack|main.js)" >> test/z-ensure-coverage.js
scripts.demo: npm run build && npm test && opener app/index.html coverage/unit/*/index.html
